nodes.text: Taka Shier was a location with a native population that resided in hives. During the Galactic Empire's reign, squadrons of the Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, led by Major Soran Keize, burned the hives of the natives at Taka Shier. Yrica Quell, who had witnessed the attack, was subjected to visions of it by Force energies from an observatory in the Cerberon system around 5 ABY.
Taka Shier appeared through flashbacks in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
